function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of AI solutions in healthcare without proper validation and oversight","Impact":"Misdiagnosis, inappropriate treatment, or reliance on inaccurate data","Mitigation":"Validation of AI algorithms, oversight by medical professionals, and continuous monitoring of outcomes","Technologies":"AI validation tools, medical oversight platforms, outcome monitoring systems","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, public health organizations","Owner":"Healthcare providers, regulatory bodies, AI developers"},{"Description":"Insufficient data privacy and security measures in COVID-19 tracking apps","Impact":"Unauthorized access to personal data, privacy violations, and potential misuse of location and Bluetooth data","Mitigation":"Encryption of data, strict access controls, transparent privacy policies, and regular security audits","Technologies":"Data encryption tools, access control systems, privacy policy frameworks","People":"App users, data subjects, government authorities","Owner":"App developers, government authorities, cybersecurity experts"},{"Description":"Potential for over-reliance on AI and automation for public safety and crowd monitoring","Impact":"Inaccurate alerts, civil liberties violations, and over-policing of public spaces","Mitigation":"Human oversight, regular calibration of AI systems, community engagement, and legal safeguards","Technologies":"AI calibration tools, community engagement platforms, legal frameworks for public safety","People":"General public, law enforcement, government authorities","Owner":"Law enforcement agencies, technology providers, legal authorities"}]}
